testsuite.name: BidControllerSpec

testcase.name: create a new bid
successfully create a new bid where the amount is exactly 0.50 higher than the startingPrice
unsuccessfully create a new bid: null bidder account
unsuccessfully create a new bid: null bid amount
unsuccessfully create a new bid: amount is below the startingPrice
unsuccessfully create a new bid: amount is below the highest bid + 0.50
successfully create a new bid: amount is higher the highest bid + 0.50

testsuite.system-out: --Output from create a new bid-- --Output from successfully create a new bid where the amount is exactly 0.50 higher than the startingPrice-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a new bid: null bidder account-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a new bid: null bid amount-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a new bid: amount is below the startingPrice-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a new bid: amount is below the highest bid + 0.50-- --Output from successfully create a new bid: amount is higher the highest bid + 0.50--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from create a new bid-- --Output from successfully create a new bid where the amount is exactly 0.50 higher than the startingPrice-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a new bid: null bidder account-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a new bid: null bid amount-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a new bid: amount is below the startingPrice-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a new bid: amount is below the highest bid + 0.50-- --Output from successfully create a new bid: amount is higher the highest bid + 0.50--

testsuite.name: BidIndexSpec

testcase.name: index with no parameters returns no more than 10 bids
index with a specific listing will return the bid history for that listing

testsuite.system-out: --Output from index with no parameters returns no more than 10 bids-- --Output from index with a specific listing will return the bid history for that listing--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from index with no parameters returns no more than 10 bids-- --Output from index with a specific listing will return the bid history for that listing--

unsuccessfully create a bid: null listing
unsuccessfully create a bid: null bidder

testsuite.name: ListingControllerSpec

testcase.name: index with no parameters returns no more than 10 OPEN listings
index with 'Show Completed Listings' checked returns no more than 10 OPEN or COMPLETED listings
index using searchDescription returns no more than 10 OPEN listings with name or description containing the searchDescription text
index with 'page 2' requested returns no more than 10 OPEN listings
index displays the highest bid (amount and account) for each listing, and completed listings are marked as 'winner'
show listing returns listing values for an OPEN listing
show listing returns listing values for a COMPLETED listing
create a listing via the controller
unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: null seller account
unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: null deliver option
unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: invalid deliver option selected

testsuite.system-out: --Output from index with no parameters returns no more than 10 OPEN listings-- --Output from index with 'Show Completed Listings' checked returns no more than 10 OPEN or COMPLETED listings-- --Output from index using searchDescription returns no more than 10 OPEN listings with name or description containing the searchDescription text-- --Output from index with 'page 2' requested returns no more than 10 OPEN listings-- --Output from index displays the highest bid (amount and account) for each listing, and completed listings are marked as 'winner'-- --Output from show listing returns listing values for an OPEN listing-- --Output from show listing returns listing values for a COMPLETED listing-- --Output from create a listing via the controller-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: null seller account-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: null deliver option-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: invalid deliver option selected--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from index with no parameters returns no more than 10 OPEN listings-- --Output from index with 'Show Completed Listings' checked returns no more than 10 OPEN or COMPLETED listings-- --Output from index using searchDescription returns no more than 10 OPEN listings with name or description containing the searchDescription text-- --Output from index with 'page 2' requested returns no more than 10 OPEN listings-- --Output from index displays the highest bid (amount and account) for each listing, and completed listings are marked as 'winner'-- --Output from show listing returns listing values for an OPEN listing-- --Output from show listing returns listing values for a COMPLETED listing-- --Output from create a listing via the controller-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: null seller account-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: null deliver option-- --Output from unsuccessfully create a listing via the controller: invalid deliver option selected--
